meanings.definition: A first-year student in high school, college, or university.
meanings.sent1: The freshman was excited to start their first day of high school.
meanings.sent2: She made many new friends as a freshman in college.
meanings.sent3: The freshman accidentally walked into the wrong classroom on the first day.
meanings.sent4: As a freshman, he was like a sponge, absorbing all the new knowledge around him.
meanings.sent5: The freshman's backpack was filled with textbooks and school supplies.

meanings.definition: A beginner or novice in a particular activity or field.
meanings.sent1: The young artist was a freshman in painting, eager to learn new techniques.
meanings.sent2: She felt like a freshman when she started learning how to play the guitar.
meanings.sent3: The freshman chef accidentally added too much salt to the dish.
meanings.sent4: As a freshman in photography, he saw the world through a new lens.
meanings.sent5: The freshman writer's stories were full of raw creativity.
